DOC.criteria: At completion Study CL0600021 , subject invited participate trial meet follow criterion : 1 . Completion 24month study , CL0600021 , regardless fully wean PN/I.V . support 2 . Signed date informed consent form ( ICF ) participate studyrelated procedure Study TEDC11001 perform
